name: Petaluma Transit
description: All local buses free to ride
fullDescription: Petaluma Transit is the local public bus service for the City of Petaluma in Sonoma County, providing fixed-route service throughout the city and connections to regional transit.
whatTheyOffer:
- All local bus routes are completely free
- No fare required for any rider
- Service throughout Petaluma
- Connections to regional transit available
howToGetIt:
1. No registration, pass, or payment needed
2. Check route map and schedule online
3. Go to any Petaluma Transit stop
4. Board when bus arrivesâ€”completely free
